commands.name: info releasenotes display
commands.description: Display Salesforce CLI release notes on the command line.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --version
optionalFlags.description: CLI version or tag for which to display release notes. By default, this command displays release notes for the currently installed CLI version on your computer. Use the --version flag to view release notes for a different release.
